title: Classic Italian Restaurant Font
content:
Hello Typophiles,  
I would like your help in identifying the attached font. I feel that I have see this font everywhere but I cannot identify it.  
Any help will be much appreciated.

Best regards

Michalis

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307091455im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2013_01_19_Amarone_146_3561.jpg)
author: galanisDesign
